response.origin:
(B): Not enough info

As a kid, I know that technology is constantly changing and it's hard for everyone to keep up. Even though adults might think we're always glued to our screens, it doesn't mean we're always up-to-date on the latest tech trends. And let's be real, some older adults are pretty savvy when it comes to technology too! So, without more information, it's not fair to say who's more out of touch. Maybe the older adult has been using Facebook since the dawn of time and the middle school student just discovered TikTok? 😜
